text: The 1915 California Golden Bears football team was an American football team that represented the University of California, Berkeley during the 1915 college football season. The team competed as an independent under head coach James Schaeffer and compiled a record of 8–5. This was Cal's first season of football since 1905 and final season as an independent. ==Schedule== ==References== California Category:California Golden Bears football seasons California Football
title: 1915 California Golden Bears football team
